医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
老年男性的高睾酮水平与房颤风险增加相关研究人员调查了较高的内源性睾酮水平是否会增加健康老年男性的心房颤动 (AF) 风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/High-testosterone-levels-in-older-men-linked-with-greater-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/High-testosterone-levels-in-older-men-linked-with-greater-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=befba4fb-2b36-47c6-8b21-a45dc2cdbe5b Thu, 02 May 2024 06:06:00 -0400 High testosterone levels in older men associated with greater risk of atrial fibrillation
英国 ELRIG 宣布 Ijeoma Uchegbu 和 Marcus Schindler 教授担任 2024 年药物发现大会的主讲人2024 年药物发现：连接思想、变革科学、赋权社区将于 10 月 2 日至 3 日在伦敦 ExCeL 举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/ELRIG-UK-announces-Profs-Ijeoma-Uchegbu-and-Marcus-Schindler-as-keynote-speakers-at-Drug-Discovery-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/ELRIG-UK-announces-Profs-Ijeoma-Uchegbu-and-Marcus-Schindler-as-keynote-speakers-at-Drug-Discovery-2024.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc0f8638-584b-4167-aaeb-09908cde69bf Thu, 02 May 2024 04:01:00 -0400 ELRIG UK announces Profs Ijeoma Uchegbu and Marcus Schindler as keynote speakers at Drug Discovery 2024
Sphere Fluidics 任命 Dale Levitzke 为首席执行官https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Sphere-Fluidics-appoints-Dale-Levitzke-as-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Sphere-Fluidics-appoints-Dale-Levitzke-as-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b6947a1-3ae7-4ddd-93d4-21561e5184be Thu, 02 May 2024 02:00:00 -0400 Sphere Fluidics appoints Dale Levitzke as Chief Executive Officer
研究表明限时饮食和高强度功能训练对健康有协同作用2024 年 5 月 1 日，英国大学的 Ranya Ameur 和 Rami Maaloul 在开放获取期刊 PLOS ONE 上发表的一项研究表明，将限时饮食与高强度功能训练相结合可能比单独使用任何一种训练更能改善身体成分和心脏代谢参数。突尼斯斯法克斯和同事们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-shows-synergistic-effects-of-time-restricted-eating-and-high-intensity-function-training-on-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-shows-synergistic-effects-of-time-restricted-eating-and-high-intensity-function-training-on-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05cf4034-d86b-4094-aab1-521979fb2661 Thu, 02 May 2024 01:54:48 -0400 Study shows synergistic effects of time-restricted eating and high-intensity functional training on health
新的大脑连接图提供了对人类意识的洞察麻省总医院（麻省总医院布里格姆医疗保健系统的创始成员）和波士顿儿童医院的一组研究人员今天在《科学转化医学》杂志上发表了一篇题为“多模态 MRI 揭示维持人类意识清醒的脑干连接”的论文，创建了大脑网络的连接图，他们认为这对人类意识至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-brain-connectivity-maps-offer-insights-into- human-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-brain-connectivity-maps-offer-insights-into- human-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d37ce7bc-c2a6-454b-b08e-83cdfa58c445 Thu, 02 May 2024 01:41:44 -0400 New brain connectivity maps offer insights into human consciousness
横河电机帮助彻底改变单细胞脂质组学领域横河电机公司最新的单细胞分析解决方案——Single Cellome™系统SS2000，在备受瞩目的《分析化学》杂志上发表了一篇文章，介绍了萨里大学的研究人员在新兴的单细胞领域进行的开创性工作。细胞脂质组学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Yokokawa-helps-to-revolutionize-the-field-of-single-cell-lipidomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Yokokawa-helps-to-revolutionize-the-field-of-single-cell-lipidomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73746951-fcad-4ca8-bea2-5df3f003942a Thu, 02 May 2024 01:16:00 -0400 Yokogawa helps to revolutionize the field of single-cell lipidomics
伦敦大学学院将共同领导英国前列腺癌​​新的 4200 万英镑筛查试验伦敦大学学院的学者将共同领导英国前列腺癌​​耗资 4200 万英镑的新筛查试验，该试验旨在找到筛查男性前列腺癌的最佳方法，使挽救的生命数量增加一倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/UCL-to-co-lead-Prostate-Cancer-UKs-new-c2a342m-screening-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/UCL-to-co-lead-Prostate-Cancer-UKs-new-c2a342m-screening-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aaa68efa-4a31-46fa-a839-f9be295c7928 Thu, 02 May 2024 00:52:56 -0400 UCL to co-lead Prostate Cancer UK's new £42m screening trial
研究揭示儿童和青少年对非运动性癫痫发作的延迟识别根据 2024 年 5 月 1 日在线期刊《Neurology®》（美国医学杂志 Neurology®）上发表的一项研究，儿童和青少年可能会经历数月或数年的非运动性癫痫发作，然后因更明显的癫痫发作（包括抽搐）而被送往急诊室。美国神经病学学会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-reveals-delayed-recognition-of-nonmotor-seizures-in-children-and-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-reveals-delayed-recognition-of-nonmotor-seizures-in-children-and-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b89f47c-5283-41e3-bc30-0ab7b0c5536e Thu, 02 May 2024 00:43:16 -0400 Study reveals delayed recognition of nonmotor seizures in children and teens
PlaqueTec 完成 800 万美元股权融资https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/PlaqueTec-closes-248-million-equity-financing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/PlaqueTec-closes-248-million-equity-financing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c77d3d78-cfd1-4036-822e-a6fd4e566c3d Thu, 02 May 2024 00:10:00 -0400 PlaqueTec closes $8 million equity financing
南佛罗里达州首个获得 FDA 批准的转移性黑色素瘤细胞疗法继美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 最近批准该疗法后，南佛罗里达州患有转移性黑色素瘤的患者很快将获得针对这种晚期皮肤癌的第一种细胞疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/First-FDA-approved-cellular-therapy-for-metastatic-melanoma-available-in-South-Florida.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/First-FDA-approved-cellular-therapy-for-metastatic-melanoma-available-in-South-Florida.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d943725e-206c-46a5-a56d-4407f3845879 Thu, 02 May 2024 00:04:49 -0400 First FDA-approved cellular therapy for metastatic melanoma available in South Florida
